Interface Application

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractApplication, Mock.MockApplication
public interface Application
Represents an Application on a Device

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    connectedToAPort()
    Return whether this Application is listening to a port on the Device this Application is on.
    boolean
    connectToPort(int port)
    Connects this Application to the specified port for the Device this Application is on.
    Device
    device()
    Returns the Device this Application is on.
    void
    receiveBroadcastMessage(String payload)
    Receive a broadcast Message and handle it accordingly.
    void
    receiveMessage(Message message)
    Receive the Message sent to this Application and handle it accordingly.
    boolean
    sendBroadcastMessage(String payload)
    Broadcast a Message to any Device open to receiving them.
    boolean
    sendMessage(Message message)
    Sends a Message from this Application to another Device and Application.

  • Method Details

    • connectToPort

      boolean connectToPort(int port)
      Connects this Application to the specified port for the Device this Application is on. Returns whether this Application was successfully connected.
      Parameters:
      port - the port to have this Application listen on for the Device this Application is on
      Returns:
      whether this Application was successfully connected to the given port

    • connectedToAPort

      boolean connectedToAPort()
      Return whether this Application is listening to a port on the Device this Application is on.
      Returns:
      whether this Application is listening on a port

    • device

      Device device()
      Returns the Device this Application is on.
      Returns:
      the Device this Application is on

    • sendMessage

      boolean sendMessage(Message message)
      Sends a Message from this Application to another Device and Application. Returns whether this Message was successfully sent to another Device or Application.
      Parameters:
      message - the Message to send
      Returns:
      whether this Message was successfully sent

    • receiveMessage

      void receiveMessage(Message message)
      Receive the Message sent to this Application and handle it accordingly.
      Parameters:
      message - the Message to receive and handle

    • sendBroadcastMessage

      boolean sendBroadcastMessage(String payload)
      Broadcast a Message to any Device open to receiving them. Return whether this Message was successfully broadcast.
      Parameters:
      payload - the actual content of the Message to send
      Returns:
      whether this Message was successfully broadcast

    • receiveBroadcastMessage

      void receiveBroadcastMessage(String payload)
      Receive a broadcast Message and handle it accordingly.
      Parameters:
      payload - the actual content of the Message to receive and handle
